body.p:
Version 1.5.4 has moved Noojee Click into a namespace to eliminate namespace pollution as well as to remove conflicts with other addons such as Toddledo.
Occasionally after loading a tab or restarting the browser the Noojee Click icons will fail to dial. Use the 'refresh' option on the Noojee Click menu to fix the problem without having to do a page reload (we are working on this problem).
If you have feature requests or installation/configuration problems post them at http://forums.noojee.com.au
